Package mru.tsc.view

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
mru.tsc.view.GUIController
public class GUIController extends Object
this class will tell the fxml file what to do with the buttons and and box's etc. this is the controller class for the program
Author:
Jonah and Victor

    • checkPlayers

      public void checkPlayers(int minPlys, int maxPlys) throws MinMaxException
      this method ensures the maximum number of players is more than the minimum number of players
      Parameters:
      minPlys - is the min variable the user gives
      maxPlys - is the max variable the user gives
      Throws:
      MinMaxException - if the max is less than the min
